reviews.text: Room was good, nothing too special but everything was cleaned good. Breakfast was very extensive and variety of options but I didn‚Äôt like it! The staff was very kind and respectful , The hotel is next to a metro station and central station was 5 minutes away by metro.

I loved the first impression I had when I entered the hotel. A wide corridor leading to reception. Makes me wonder how this hotel was built right on top of tunnels. Watching the traffic of vehicles entering the tunnel under the hotel while h√§vning breakfast.

They have a great complete breakfast buffet. Samuel welcomed us very warmly and visited us several times if we needed anything that we might not have found in the buffet. Thank you üôè

We will definitely come back to stay and enjoy a weekend there one day.

Nice hotel with very good breakfast and comfortable beds. Good localization, near the metro station. One disconvenience are rooms towards highway, on lower levels it could be noisy. Good restaurant inside!

Room was good, nothing too special but everything was cleaned good. Breakfast was very extensive, so much too choose from! The staff was very kind and helpful, we could store our bags in the morning before checking into our room. We had a nice view with our bed next to out window. The hotel is next to a metro station and central station was 5 minutes away by metro.
Very nice hotel in Stockholm.  Very to the subway station and bus station.  Decently priced.  Helpful staff.  Great breakfast except the egg white of the hard boiled eggs is way too mushy.
